resources.string:
This app allows to transfer/receive files from another device in Peer to Peer (P2P). P2P means that the data transferred goes directly from one device to another, without any intermediate server.

To be able to transfer files, both devices need to be on the same local network.
The best use is to share data with one of the smartphone and connect the other device to the data shared
To receive a file, go to the receive screen and then enter the IP address and port of the sender device, then press \'start receiving\'.\nYou can the see the progress on the notification created

To send a file, pick one by clicking on the button. Once it is done, your IP address and port will be displayed on the screen, you\'ll have to provide them to the receiving device.\nAfter the receiving peer will have enter your network information, the transfer will start. You can the see the progress on the notification created
